#include <stdlib.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <utility>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
#define swap(x,y) { int _t = (x); (x) = (y); (y) = _t; }
#define min(x,y) ((x) < (y) ? (x) : (y))
#define max(x,y) ((x) > (y) ? (x) : (y))
#define FORab(i,a,b) for(int i = (a); i < (int)b; i++)
#define FORn(i,n) FORab(i,0,n)
#define PRINT(x) cout << #x << " = " << x << endl
 
vector<string> arr;
 
int cmp(const void* a, const void* b) {
	const char* sa = (const char*)a;
	const char* sb = (const char*)b;
 
	int i;
	for(i = 0; sa[i] && sb[i]; i++)
		if(sa[i] > sb[i])
			return 1;
		else if(sa[i] < sb[i])
			return -1;
 
	if(!sa[i] && !sb[i])
		return 0;
	else
		return (sa[i] ? 1 : -1);
}
 
int main() {
	int N;
	scanf("%d", &N);
 
	char names[N][101];
	FORn(i,N) scanf("%s", names[i]);
 
	qsort(names, N, 101, cmp);
 
	//FORn(i,N) printf("%s\n", names[i]);
 
	int maxl = 0;
 
	FORn(i,N-1) {
		int j = 0;
		while(names[i][j] && names[i+1][j] && (names[i][j] == names[i+1][j]))
			j++;
		//PRINT(j);
		if(j > maxl)
			maxl = j;
	}
 
	printf("%d\n", maxl);
 
	return 0;
}
